about_the_game:
Two mighty Alliances are locked in an escalating struggle, and it is time for you to choose a side! Forge your path as you develop your character, grow your guild, and delve into the mysteries of a vast open world! Engage in combat, perfect your skills and sharpen your battle tactics, compete in tournaments, craft or acquire unique equipment, and venture through dark dungeons!

Massive PvP Battles

Warspear Online welcomes those with a thirst for relentless and nearly boundless PvP action. While the realm is abundant with places to test your mettle, it's on the fabled island of Irselnort that the fiercest battles unfold. Whether it's taking over enemy camps, defending your strongholds, or engaging in epic clashes with hundreds of players, the thrill is unmatched! And for those seeking the ultimate challenge, guilds have the opportunity to clash in huge battles to lay claim to their very own castle!

Unique Crafting and Item Enhancement System

Acquiring gear in Warspear Online isn't limited to defeating bosses, exploring dungeons, or trading with other players. Forge and enhance equipment with your own hands using runes, crystals, and enhancement spheres to add the attributes you need. The finest gear is that which you've crafted yourself!

Captivating Story and Rich Lore

While pixelated faces may not convey the full depth of their emotions, the world of Arinar remains on the brink of destruction and in desperate need of heroes. Step into this world and be part of the pivotal events that will shape its destiny!

Origins of Arinar

Arinar, a realm steeped in magic, was shaped by the will of the White Wanderer in forgotten times. The Spear, a monument to balance and order, once stood at its heart. Millennia later, war brought Arinar to the abyss. The elves and humans, sworn protectors of balance, were overrun by the barbarians and undead, led by the devious, power-hungry god Garahan. With the Spear shattered and a calamity forcing foes to a temporary truce, a fragile peace settled over the wounded land. But peace is fleeting, and the seeds of conflict have taken root. Four warring races now brace for a showdown to reforge the Warspear and decide Arinar's fate.

  • 2 alliances and 4 factions: the Firstborn and Chosen against the Mountain Clans and Forsaken

  • 20 character classes with their own special skills and traits

  • Unrestricted PvP areas, alliance battles, castle sieges, Arena, and friendly duels

  • Guilds, competitive tournaments, holiday celebrations, and player-to-player trading

  • 1500+ storyline and hundreds of daily quests

  • Thousands of monsters and bosses for PvE challenges

  • 9 professions to master gear crafting

  • Customizable appearance: from costumes and weapon skins to hairstyles and hair dyes

  • 100+ expert skills to tailor your own builds

  • Personal achievements with unique rewards and a Top-1000 leaderboard
detailed_description:
Free DLC Welcome Pack



Welcome to Warspear Online! We prepared a gift for everyone who has joined us on Steam. It will be useful for newbies, as well as for experienced players.


About the Game

Two mighty Alliances are locked in an escalating struggle, and it is time for you to choose a side! Forge your path as you develop your character, grow your guild, and delve into the mysteries of a vast open world! Engage in combat, perfect your skills and sharpen your battle tactics, compete in tournaments, craft or acquire unique equipment, and venture through dark dungeons!

Massive PvP Battles

Warspear Online welcomes those with a thirst for relentless and nearly boundless PvP action. While the realm is abundant with places to test your mettle, it's on the fabled island of Irselnort that the fiercest battles unfold. Whether it's taking over enemy camps, defending your strongholds, or engaging in epic clashes with hundreds of players, the thrill is unmatched! And for those seeking the ultimate challenge, guilds have the opportunity to clash in huge battles to lay claim to their very own castle!

Unique Crafting and Item Enhancement System

Acquiring gear in Warspear Online isn't limited to defeating bosses, exploring dungeons, or trading with other players. Forge and enhance equipment with your own hands using runes, crystals, and enhancement spheres to add the attributes you need. The finest gear is that which you've crafted yourself!

Captivating Story and Rich Lore

While pixelated faces may not convey the full depth of their emotions, the world of Arinar remains on the brink of destruction and in desperate need of heroes. Step into this world and be part of the pivotal events that will shape its destiny!

Origins of Arinar

Arinar, a realm steeped in magic, was shaped by the will of the White Wanderer in forgotten times. The Spear, a monument to balance and order, once stood at its heart. Millennia later, war brought Arinar to the abyss. The elves and humans, sworn protectors of balance, were overrun by the barbarians and undead, led by the devious, power-hungry god Garahan. With the Spear shattered and a calamity forcing foes to a temporary truce, a fragile peace settled over the wounded land. But peace is fleeting, and the seeds of conflict have taken root. Four warring races now brace for a showdown to reforge the Warspear and decide Arinar's fate.

  • 2 alliances and 4 factions: the Firstborn and Chosen against the Mountain Clans and Forsaken

  • 20 character classes with their own special skills and traits

  • Unrestricted PvP areas, alliance battles, castle sieges, Arena, and friendly duels

  • Guilds, competitive tournaments, holiday celebrations, and player-to-player trading

  • 1500+ storyline and hundreds of daily quests

  • Thousands of monsters and bosses for PvE challenges

  • 9 professions to master gear crafting

  • Customizable appearance: from costumes and weapon skins to hairstyles and hair dyes

  • 100+ expert skills to tailor your own builds

  • Personal achievements with unique rewards and a Top-1000 leaderboard
ext_user_account_notice: Warspear Online Account (Supports Linking to Steam Account)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (Trusty Tahr)
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.3-compatible; 128 Mb video memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL-compatible
  • Additional Notes: libc6 (>= 2.19), libopenal1, libcurl3
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Debian 8 (Jessie)
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0-compatible; 256 Mb video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL-compatible
  • Additional Notes: libc6 (>= 2.19), libopenal1, libcurl3

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.3-compatible; 128 Mb video memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL-compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0-compatible; 256 Mb video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL-compatible

name: Warspear Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.3-compatible; 128 Mb video memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL-compatible
  • Additional Notes: You may need to update your graphics drivers for OpenGL 1.3 support.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0-compatible; 256 Mb video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL-compatible
  • Additional Notes: You may need to update your graphics drivers for OpenGL 3.0 support.

reviews:
“Overall, some people may be put-off by the old school graphics, but Warspear Online is arguably one of the best classic-style MMOs. There’s simply a lot you can do, from exploring the vast world to strengthening your character by fighting monsters. It is highly recommended and it might be the game you’re looking for.”
Mmosquare

“The only real "open world PvP" mmorpg. Just watch some warspear war videos on YouTube and you'll see what I'm talking about.”
Metacritic

“Eight-bit is so in right now, and my little barbarian is so adorable.”
Engadget
short_description: Create your hero and dive into an epic 2D MMORPG! Explore a vast open world, conquer castles, battle in free-for-all PvP, team up in guilds, join Alliance wars, explore dungeons, and celebrate with fun in-game events!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, German, Simplified Chinese, Indonesian, Polish
